entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023
